description: Creates a CrewAI Task and its associated Agent for sequential execution.

llm.info: Language model that will run the agent

memory.info: Whether the agent should have memory or not

allow_delegation.info: Whether the agent is allowed to delegate tasks to other agents

allow_code_execution.info: Whether the agent is allowed to execute code

task_description.info: Descriptive text detailing task's purpose and execution

expected_output.info: Clear definition of expected task outcome

async_execution.info: Boolean flag indicating asynchronous task execution

previous_task.info: The previous task in the sequence (for chaining)

status.created: Agent and task created successfully - Role: {role}, Total tasks: {task_count}

errors.import_failed: CrewAI is not installed. Please install it with `uv pip install crewai`.
errors.build_failed: Failed to build agent and task: {error}
